nodes.text: The Imperial Armored Platform Model I Command attack droid was a battle droid used by the Imperial Remnant, primarily during the Battle of Cadinth.

It was created by Arakyd, makers of the Arakyd Viper. The AP-1-C was armed with a repeating blaster, but more commonly was used, as its name suggests, as a commander for its ally AP-2 and AP-3 attack droids.
The Imperial Attack Droid B model was designed for the abandoned The Epic Continues story line. The prototype model was made by kitbashing 2-1B and 4-LOM figures, and was given Zuckuss' gun.
